divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking back with my little brother from the gym. located in Queens New York. When i glanced up to the sky and noticed a white bright light flying over the airplane traffic. i could tell the difference from this object and the airplanes and helicopters. this had no air craft lights. I was able to take three pictures. the craft disappeared into the horizon. some one else had to see it. Even the airplanes in the area may have caught it on radar. When you zoom in on the pictures you can notice something strange. I thought it was a plane at first or a helicopter. It flew in a straight line into the horizon. it probably past near LaGuardia Airport. I was mesmerized how it was just cruising past the planes. it was bright and beautiful
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 4 other sightings in New York on or around June 4th 2013
Summary: walking back from the gym with my little brother. noticed a white bright light cruising above the airplane traffic. i could distinguish the aircraft from this object. i took three pictures with my iphone 5. when i zoomed in it looked strange.
